results.title: Activation of AMPK restricts coxsackievirus B3 replication by inhibiting lipid accumulation.
results.text_hl: The @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@ agonist @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, which has been widely used in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ therapy, could decrease the viral replication and further protect the @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ from myocardial histological and functional changes in @SPECIES_12072 @@@CVB3@@@ induced @<m>DISEASE_Myocarditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009205 @@@myocarditis@@@, and improve the survival rate of infected @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Xie W, Wang L, Dai Q, Yu H, He X, Xiong J, Sheng H, Zhang D, Xin R, Qi Y, Hu F, Guo S, Zhang K. Activation of AMPK restricts coxsackievirus B3 replication by inhibiting lipid accumulation. J Mol Cell Cardiol. 2015 Aug;85():155-67. PMID: 26055448
